p: Montanoa Cerv. in Llave & Lex genus belongs to Heliantheae tribe, Asteraceae Family, and is composed by 75 species found mainly in Mexico and Central America with five species endemics to northern South America [ 2, 3, 4]. Species of this family are characterized by producing mainly sesquiterpenes, sesquiterpene lactones, acetylenic compounds, inulin-type fructans, triterpenes, and flavonoids [ 1, 5].
